You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesF F] > &fscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Fscr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2131/index.htm U+02131].
  * `&fscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4BB.
